pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, July 28, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupré, Quebec

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Holy Mass celebrated by His Holiness Pope Francis.

Basilica of Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupré

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
